sections.heading: Sale, lease, or transfer; election and voter approval required; exceptions; procedure
sections.text: In the following cases, a sale, lease, or transfer of any electric light or power plant, distribution system, or transmission line shall not be valid unless the sale, lease, or transfer is authorized at any state o

sections.heading: not applicable to transaction fully carried out before act became effective. Babson v. Village of Ulysses, 155 Neb. 492, 52 N.W.2d 320 (1952).
